title: [Scoria and Dross]
description: Rivulets of wax drip down from the wrought iron chandelier in the center of the foundry, the colorful veins highlighting the pale stone of the floor below.  The ceiling-high forge stands against the furthest wall, its blue-white fire dancing before a curvilinear cast iron display of wares highlighted by the licking flames.  A series of stylized statues lay scattered amongst tomes of blackened leather, the forms affixed with parchments covered in charcoal sketches.
